posts.title: Vulnerability analysis with RHACS
posts.summary: In this first exercise we'll analyze container images for vulnerabilities.

posts.title: Creating customised CVE reports with RHACS
posts.summary: In the second exercise we'll generate and export data for a CVE campaign, using the RHACS RESTful API.

posts.title: Blocking vulnerable workloads from OpenShift
posts.summary: In the third exercise we'll block vulnerable container images from OpenShift

posts.title: Detecting unauthorized application behaviour at runtime with RHACS
posts.summary: In this exercise we'll identify and block unauthorized behaviours in container applications at runtime.
